Articles.Content: I saw this on Reddit and want to open the discussion here. Now that we see what the remaining KSC models look like, does anyone else think the Barn was the best one of them all? I liked how it was modeled completely different from the Tier 4 buildings. It looked original and as if it held it's own. The current tier 1 & 2 models look like they are just empty space. I want to see my space center evolve, not just be filled in.
